nodes.text: A brig was the compartment of a starship or military base where prisoners were confined. The Imperial Academy at Carida had a brig in which Cadet Han Solo spent time after attempting to steal a TIE fighter. The MC85 Star Cruiser Raddus, the flagship of General Leia Organa of the Resistance, had one, and so did some of the transports used by the Resistance navy.
Tipoca City on Kamino had a brig where Clone Force 99 were held as prisoners just after the Proclamation of the New Order.
